item.title: How I prepared my Mac to make some Docker development
item.description: This post is about how I did it! not about a standard way or something like that, if you use any other way I would be happy to hear it on the comments. I usually use boot2docker on my machine to run container, but it looks like it was misbehaving a little bit when I was trying to create the binary of my dev branch with: $ make binary Actually, it was just not creating it.
